text: Tamen zhong youren wangtu shanghai xianzhi [mu sheng]. Tamen shuo:“Ta zhishi yi zhi [chuansong xiaoxi de] erduo eryi.” Ni shuo:“Ta zhi ting dui nimen zui hao de, ta quexin an la, xinren xinshimen, shi nimen zhongxinshi di fu hui.” Fan wangtu shanghai an la de shizhe [mu sheng] de renmen, tamen bi shou tongku de xingfa.
